name: Cause of Death Forensics
description: Examining forensic evidence to determine cause, manner, and time of death.

cards.title: Autopsy Procedures & Forensic Pathology
cards.description: Step-by-step analysis of human remains to determine cause of death.
bulletpoints: Perform external and internal examinations on remains
Analyze organ damage, wound patterns, and trauma indicators
Document findings for use in legal proceedings
cards.summaryText: Conduct full autopsies to map trauma, document evidence, and nail down cause of death.

cards.title: Toxicology Reports & Poisoning Investigations
cards.description: Identifying toxins, drugs, and other substances in homicide investigations.
bulletpoints: Use forensic chemistry to detect poisons and overdose substances
Analyze blood and tissue samples for chemical traces
Correlate toxicology findings with cause and manner of death
cards.summaryText: Run toxicology on fluids and tissues to tie chemical agents to the fatal outcome.
